author: {'steamid': '76561198117934591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1631319177}
review:
El juego cuesta mucho para los $120 pesos que cuestan. Si bien no es mucho dinero, el juego sigue costando lo mismo en pleno 2021 y se nota que está en abandono total por mas de 4 años. No hay mas de 30 min de gameplay y todo lleno de Bugs y errores.
Ya se que dice que aún está en desarrollo. Pero que tampoco se pasen de verga.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171061327', 'num_games_owned': 468, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1509974961}
review:
El juego dura 30 min max ya que esta incompleto... Llevan mas de 6 meses sin una actualización. Huele muy mal. El juego prometia pero tal como avanzas aparencen bug tras bug. 

Pudo ser y salvo que actualizen de una .... Vez y metan algo no lo recomiendo para nada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198331907211', 'num_games_owned': 291, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1515091402}
review: While there are still a few mechanical issues that need some work, I absolutely loved the different style gameplays presented with the first person section within the home and having to avoid the lurking enemy then moving to the third person, Silent Hill-like style that brought the game into a survival/exploration horror rather than sticking to the defenseless! Great balance and looking forward to final release for sure!

author: {'steamid': '76561198038321010', 'num_games_owned': 2391, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1505522568}
review:
Maybe with enough updates this could be an interesting game. But for now, glitches abound, terrible performance, ridiculous story, absolutely cheap gameplay mechanics for the enemy, and hilarious voice-acting.

Oh wait. That's like all of the game. DO NOT BUY.

If you need more evidence, here's some of the worst and strangest moments of the game.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L5G8CGVF8kU

author: {'steamid': '76561198352311451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1506452920}
review: For an early access game its good but does need some work, needs a few changes like making the characters movement more smooth and not looking like a constant struggle when running and is quite buggy right now (but its early access so i'll let it slide :P) . I admit i was super excited about this game being in a haunted house and having to get around the spooks and from then ending of the trailer i had seen is what made me buy it, i wish it had more of that as that was what i was interested in, its hard to scare me and this certainly got me on the edge of my seat, however when that came to an end and i was outside i felt like i'd kinda was in a silent hill game with the fog and no one around and fighting monsters. I love the idea of going into first person mode when entering a house as it gives more suspense as to whats around the next corner and you feel like your more into the game than just a character. I like where this game is going but i loved being in the scarey haunted appartment more than the outside, it got me more on edge, i  hope it continues with the jumpscares as its rare to find good ones in games. I look forward to playing the full release.

author: {'steamid': '76561198394221655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1505890856}

author: {'steamid': '76561198065129410', 'num_games_owned': 673, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1505448255}
review:
I personally thought this game was pretty nice. It scared the shit outa me a few times but it has a couple bugs but what more can you expect since its Alpha. Honestly I can suggest people who like horror games to buy this. Made me jump a few times and I had chills the entire time.

Heres gameplay of it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ZjlD4yOOSk

author: {'steamid': '76561198266253135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1541202052}
review: Barely playable, runs around 20fps. And my pc is WAY above the system requirements. But it might be a bug since it's early access. Just wait for the final version or some alpha releases. I fell out of the world the first time I played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056700704', 'num_games_owned': 1370, 'num_reviews': 594, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1505482527}
review:
ある凄惨な事件の起こった家で
その恐怖を追体験するような内容。

同じエリアを何度も繰り返し探索するシステムで
P.T.を模倣したんだなという印象が強く残りました。

犯人（？）の登場の仕方や次に進むためのフラグに脈絡がなく
ただただP.T.みたいなゲームを作りたかっただけなんじゃないかと
感じるだけの内容でした。
